torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with slimy slerm skin.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldAlligator(slerm)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
torso.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] torso has [npc.a_femininity(true)] appearance, and is [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.skinFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] skin constently leaks slime.
